description: This hike is described in 103 Hikes and begins at the end of Skyline Drive in North Vancouver. Here, you begin along the Baden Powell trail heading West, taking the North fork to connect with the old BCMC trail. Continue on this trail to the top of Grouse mountain and the chalet. Descend the old BCMC and take the for heading towards the base of the grouse grind trail until you reach the other branch of the Baden Powell that you did not take earlier. Head East back towards the trailhead where you started to complete the loop.
directions: Heading West/North from Vancouver on highway 1, take the Lonsdale Ave exit and head North on Lonsdale. Follow this road until it ends and turns to the left where it turns to Montroyal Blvd. Follow Montreal until you turn right (North) on Skyline Drive. Take a right onto the branch of Skyline drive which heads uphill to a small parking area, a map, and the trailhead.
title: Lower Grouse Mountain
